title: Part 2: Kevin Nealon + News (ACS October 24)
itunes:title: Part 2: Kevin Nealon + News (ACS October 24)
description:
Actor and comedian, Kevin Nealon, joins Adam in the studio to talk about his new book,  ‘I Exaggerate: My Brushes with Fame’, a collection of caricature portraits and personal stories about the notable people he has met throughout his life. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Steve Bannon being sentenced to 4 months for contempt of Congress, daycare workers being charged after scaring kids with a ‘Scream’ mask, and a new horror movie that is so terrifying it is causing people to vomit and faint. 

PLUGS:

Check out Kevin Nealon’s book, ‘I Exaggerate: My Brushes with Fame’ available tomorrow wherever you find books

See Kevin Nealon live: 

Grand Rapids, MI - Grand Rapids Comedy Club - November 10 & 11

Holland, MI - Park Theater - November 12

And for more dates, visit KevinNealon.com 

And follow him on Twitter, @Kevin_Nealon

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

Geico.com

The Jordan Harbinger Show
